properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 10 at 2:51AM PST until January 12 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very steep and hazardous seas 19 to 24 feet expected.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Saturday to 3 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Very large and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in port
until hazardous seas subside.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 3 AM PST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING
